sourcesContent:
import React,{ useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Table,Button,Input,Segment} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import '../App.css' const ShowRequest=(props)=> { const[refresh,setRef]=useState(props.refresh) const datas=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("info" || "[]")) const initialInfo=async()=>{ let f=await props.contract.methods.getreqNo().call() const info = await Promise.all( Array(parseInt(f)).fill().map((element, index) => { return props.contract.methods.getRequeststatus(index).call(); }) ) localStorage.setItem("info",JSON.stringify(info)) } useEffect(()=>{ console.log("inside useeffect") initialInfo(); },[refresh]) return (
Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors Payment Completed { datas.map((e,index)=>( {index} {e[6]} {e[5]} {props.web3.utils.fromWei(e[1])} {e[2]} {e[3]}/{e[4]} {e[0]} )) }
) } export default ShowRequest
